channel.title: Zipping files into single archives?
channel.description: k. I have 2100 SNES roms that I want to zip up. I want them into diff archives (Mario.zip, Yoshi.zip) But I don't want to manually zip 2100 roms. Is their a command line that I can use to zip these things up?
